message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
